resources.string: Attached is a KeepScore spreadsheet in CSV format.\ \n\nThis file can be opened using your favorite spreadsheet program, such as Excel, \ LibreOffice, or Google Docs.

Attached is a KeepScore backup file.\ 

To import it into KeepScore, simply open the attachment using your favorite email app.\ 

If that doesn't work, save the file to /sdcard/keepscore/backups and choose "Restore" from the KeepScore main menu. 

To get KeepScore, visit https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.nolanlawson.keepscore .
